title: Kyle
body:
Hello Kyle.
I am Detective Awesomesauce. I'm investigating Jacob Wright's death. <<if not visited ("Kyle.Questions")>>
Kyle: I see. I am the doorman here, so I see to all the guests and residents coming and going. <<if not visited ("Kyle.Questions")>>
Kyle: What do you need, Detective? <<if not visited ("Kyle.Angry")>>
Kyle: What do you want? <<if visited ("Kyle.Angry")>>
[[I'd like to ask you some questions|Kyle.Questions]]
[[Nothing for now|Kyle.Exit]]

Hello Kyle.
I am Detective Awesomesauce. I'm investigating Jacob Wright's death. <<if not visited ("Kyle.Questions")>>
Kyle: I see. I am the doorman here, so I see to all the guests and residents coming and going. <<if not visited ("Kyle.Questions")>>
Kyle: What do you need?
[[I'd like to ask you some questions|Kyle.Questions]]
[[Nothing for now|Kyle.Exit]]

title: Kyle.Questions
body:
[[I understand you were the one who called the police|Kyle.Call]] <<Not visited ("Kyle.Call")>>
[[What can you tell me about Mr. Wright. Did you know him well?|Kyle.KnowVictim]] <<Not visited ("Kyle.KnowVictim")>>
[[I found evidence that someone else was in the apartment. Did you see anyone enter?|Kyle.SawRutledge]] <<Visited ("Whisky-Glass1")>>
[[Nothing else for now|Kyle.Exit]]

[[I understand you were the one who called the police|Kyle.Call]]
[[What can you tell me about Mr. Wright. Did you know him well?|Kyle.KnowVictim]]
[[I found evidence that someone else was in the apartment. Did you see anyone enter?|Kyle.SawRutledge]]
[[Nothing else for now|Kyle.Exit]]

title: Kyle.Exit
body:
Kyle: Okay, I'll wait here. <<if not visited Kyle.Angry>>
Kyle: Whatever. <<if visited Kyle.Angry>>

title: Kyle.KnowVictim
body:
Kyle: Didn’t know Mr. Wright all that well sorry. Conversation rarely went beyond the usual pleasantries.
Kyle: He tipped well when the need arose. He was forever bringing good looking women back, subtlety was never his style.
Was he with one of these women tonight? [[Kyle.WithWoman]]
Do you know anyone that would want to kill Mr. Wright? [[Kyle.MurderSuspects]]

title: Kyle.WithWoman
body:
Kyle: Not that I saw, if I recall correctly his latest squeeze was Nora Hastings.
Kyle: Some sort of model I think, whatever kind of job that is...
[[I understand you were the one who called the police|Kyle.Call]] <<Not visited (Kyle.Call")>>
[[I found evidence that someone else was in the apartment. Did you see anyone enter?|Kyle.SawRutledge]] <<Visited ("Whisky-Glass1")>>
[[Nothing else for now|Kyle.Exit]]

title: Kyle.MurderSuspects
body:
Kyle: I’m sorry detective. I just stand here watching those richer than me go through a door.
Kyle: The last thing I want to do when I get home is research them.
[[I understand you were the one who called the police|Kyle.Call]] <<Not visited ("Kyle.Call")>>
[[I found evidence that someone else was in the apartment. Did you see anyone enter?|Kyle.SawRutledge]] <<Visited ("Whisky-Glass1")>>
[[Nothing else for now|Kyle.Exit]]

title: Kyle.Call
body:
Kyle: That’s right, Lola found Mr. Wright in his apartment then came straight to me. I called the police immediately.
[[Why would Lola come to you first instead of calling the police?|Kyle.Angry]]
[[How did Lola seem when she alerted you to the body?|Kyle.Body]] <<if not visited ("Kyle.Angry")>>
[[Thanks Kyle, nothing else for now|Kyle.Exit]]

title: Kyle.Angry
body:
Kyle: Look, I don’t know what you’re trying to insinuate but Lola’s a good girl.
Kyle: She’s only new here, she didn’t want to get into trouble so she came to me first.
Kyle: Now do you have any more questions, or can I go?
[[ I’m just doing my job Mr. Gordon. How did Lola seem when she alerted you to the body?|Kyle.Body]]
[[What can you tell me about Mr. Wright. Did you know him well?|Kyle.KnowVictim]] <<Not visited ("Kyle.KnowVictim")>>
[[I found evidence that someone else was in the apartment. Did you see anyone enter?|Kyle.SawRutledge]] <<Visited ("Whisky-Glass1")>>
[[Not just yet. I'll be back with more questions.|Kyle.Exit]]

title: Kyle.Body
body:
Kyle: She seemed scared and close to tears, how do you think the poor girl seemed? <<if visited ("Kyle.Angry")>>
Kyle: If you don’t have anymore questions I think I’m about done talking.  <<if visited ("Kyle.Angry")>>
Kyle: She seemed scared and close to tears. I think it was quite a shock for her. <<if not visited ("Kyle.Angry")>>
[[What can you tell me about Mr. Wright. Did you know him well?|Kyle.KnowVictim]] <<Not visited ("Kyle.KnowVictim")>>
[[I found evidence that someone else was in the apartment. Did you see anyone enter?|Kyle.SawRutledge]] <<Visited ("Whisky-Glass1")>>
[[Nothing else for now|Kyle.Exit]]

title: Kyle.SawRutledge
body:
Kyle: Hmm... his old business partner Logan Rutledge came around at 5:45pm.
Kyle: Left at about 7. Don’t remember anyone else visiting today but I was on break from 6 to 6:30. 
[[Does Mr. Rutledge visit often?|Kyle.RutledgeVisit]]
[[How did he seem when you saw him leave?|Kyle.RutledgeMood]]

title: Kyle.RutledgeVisit
body:
Kyle: He definitely was one of Mr. Wright’s more frequent male visitors.
Kyle: He used to come around at least once a week.
[[How did he seem when you saw him leave?|Kyle.RutledgeMood]] <<if not visited ("Kyle.RutledgeMood")>>
[[I understand you were the one who called the police|Kyle.Call]] <<Not visited ("Kyle.Call")>>
[[What can you tell me about Mr. Wright. Did you know him well?|Kyle.KnowVictim]] <<Not visited ("Kyle.KnowVictim")>>
[[I found evidence that someone else was in the apartment. Did you see anyone enter?|Kyle.SawRutledge]] <<Visited ("Whisky-Glass1")>>
[[Nothing else for now|Kyle.Exit]]

title: Kyle.RutledgeMood
body:
Kyle: It's hard to say with that man.
Kyle: He was walking like he was in a hurry though...
[[Does Mr. Rutledge visit often?|Kyle.RutledgeVisit]] <<if not visited ("Kyle.RutledgeVisit")>>
[[I understand you were the one who called the police|Kyle.Call]] <<Not visited ("Kyle.Call")>>
[[What can you tell me about Mr. Wright. Did you know him well?|Kyle.KnowVictim]] <<Not visited ("Kyle.KnowVictim")>>
[[I found evidence that someone else was in the apartment. Did you see anyone enter?|Kyle.SawRutledge]] <<Visited ("Whisky-Glass1")>>
[[Nothing else for now|Kyle.Exit]]
